thread.title: Zambia: Poland Keen At Sealing Trade Deals With Zambia
thread.title_full: Zambia: Poland Keen At Sealing Trade Deals With Zambia

title: Zambia: Poland Keen At Sealing Trade Deals With Zambia
text:
He said in an interview that other products were plastics, rubber, chemical products, food products (meat, diary), furniture and white goods. 
Mr Krezel will be in Lusaka to explore various trade opportunities with various stakeholders. 
He said Poland had also exceptional growth in the service sector, largely driven by Foreign Direct Investment. 
"I am looking forward to having high level talks with the Zambian business community so we can establish areas of trade," he said. Zambia
